CREATE TABLE security_events (
    event_id UUID,
    sensor_id UUID,
    event_type STRING,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_description STRING,
    PRIMARY KEY (event_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_devices (
    sensor_id UUID,
    sensor_type STRING,
    sensor_location STRING,
    PRIMARY KEY (sensor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE security_users (
    user_id UUID,
    user_name STRING,
    user_role STRING,
    user_email STRING,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
)

)

)
